title: Animal Crossing / Mario & Luigi: Dream Team dialogue font
content:

Tried to identify it, no luck.

Font: 

 Humming 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Pidjohto

comments.content:
[Humming](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/fontworks.co.jp/font/basic/humming/L.html) by Fujita Shigenobu for Fontworks (specimen [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/fontworks.co.jp/font/sample/data/humming.pdf))  
Alternatives: [Seconda](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/seconda) Round, Soft and XtraSoft by Durotype, [Merge](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/philatype/merge), [Arial Rounded MTI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/arial-rounded)

Animals are the part of our society and people like to keep them as pet animal. I think that so many animals are there but people knows very few animals. If the specimen of every animals would be available in any zoo then people can get the information regarding different types of animal. But you have to take the proper care of the animals food and health. [chatsworth Vet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054211/http:/www.drronsanimalhospitalsimivalley.com/preventative_health_care.html)
